加载包
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
setwd("D:/Data/01/blinks2/")
flies<-list.files("D:/Data/01/blinks2/")
subfiles<-files[grepl(pattern=".csv",files)] sapply(subfiles,function(x){
  paste0("blink",x) %>% file.rename(x,.)
  })

```

```{r}
setwd("D:/Data/01/blinks2/")
datafile <- list.flies(pattern = ".asc")
filesNewName <-gsub("asc","blink",datafile)
flie.rebame(datafile,filesNewName)

```

```{r}
setwd("D:/Data/01/blinks2/")
files<-list.files("D:/Data/01/blinks2/") for (f in files){ newname<-sub(".asc",'.blink',f) file.rename(f,newname)}dir()
```
